title: note2midi
description: The `note2midi` object converts musical note names (e.g., 'C4', 'E#+5', 'Db-4') into their corresponding MIDI pitch values. It supports enharmonic spellings, double sharps/flats (using 'x' and 'bb'), and quarter tones (using '+' and '-'). The object expects note names as symbols or lists, with 'C4' representing MIDI pitch 60, and handles an octave range from 0 to 8.
